author: cms-tau-pog
body:
Updated RecoTauTag/RecoTau and RecoTauTag/Configuration to EPS 2013 recommendations: RecoTauTag/RecoTau V01-04-25 and RecoTauTag/Configuration V01-04-14

Adapted HLTriggerOffline/Higgs package to use hpsPFTauProducer collection
Updated Validation/RecoTau to contain latest tools that are used by the Tau POG validation team and use only supported tau collection
title: Tau POG 2013 recommendations
